name: Plucking Pikmin E+
description:
This is a fangame. Pikmin is made by Nintendo.

Controls:

Space selects and plucks.

E changes direction. (and cancels selection)

Q opens menu.

also move with arrows or wasd lol

This game contains a Level Editor with a community levels page! you can submit your levels using this form. https://forms.gle/ff44NQFcm4W2tUrT6
